wave3-dx-config.title: Wave 3.2: Developer Experience & Config Hardening
wave3-dx-config.instruction_raw: Implement MISSION_wave3_dx_config_spec.md. Create a ConfigProxy for dynamic configuration resolution and set up an auto-discovery mechanism for Gemini manifest registration.

wave1-finance-protocol.title: Wave 1.1: Financial Protocol Enforcement
wave1-finance-protocol.instruction_raw: Implement MISSION_wave1_finance_protocol_spec.md. Ensure IInvestor and IPropertyOwner protocols are used in MonetaryTransactionHandler, fix accounting for buyer expenses, and enforce strict rollback in the Bank interface.

wave1-lifecycle-hygiene.title: Wave 1.2: System Lifecycle & Dependency Hygiene
wave1-lifecycle-hygiene.instruction_raw: Implement MISSION_wave1_lifecycle_hygiene_spec.md. Create SystemFactory for SettlementSystem DI, optimize DeathSystem agent removal, and scrub inter_tick_queue upon agent death.

wave2-firm-architecture.title: Wave 2.1: Firm Architecture Overhaul
wave2-firm-architecture.instruction_raw: Implement MISSION_wave2_firm_architecture_spec.md. Remove self.parent from Firm departments, enforce DTO passing, and ensure Brand/Sales/HR Engines return ResultDTOs without mutating state.

wave2-market-policy.title: Wave 2.2: Market & Policy Refinement
wave2-market-policy.instruction_raw: Implement MISSION_wave2_market_policy_spec.md. Introduce CanonicalOrderDTO, implement StockIDHelper for robust ID parsing, and add TaxBracketDTO for progressive taxation in the Government.
